content: {"name": "Salvation Army (supports Guilford County North Carolina)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "call in advance to have your name in the list.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "812 North Anthony Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Burlington", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27217", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 36.0850546, "longitude": -79.4243185}, "phones": [{"number": "(336) 227-5529", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
